title: Top Places to visit in Una, Himachal Pradesh
Top Places to visit in Solan, Himachal Pradesh
content: Solan is the district headquarters of Solan district (created on 1 September 1972) in the Indian state of Himachal Pradesh. The largest Municipal Council of Himachal Pradesh, it is located 46 kilometres (29 mi) south of the state capital, Shimla. At an average elevation of 1,600 metres (5,200 ft)

title: Top Places to visit in Sirmaur, Nahan, Himachal Pradesh
content: Sirmaur is the southern most district in the south-eastern region of Himachal Pradesh, India. It is largely mountainous and rural, with 90% of its population living in villages. title: Top Places to visit in Shimla, Himachal Pradesh
content: Shimla, also known as Simla, is the capital and the largest city of the Indian state of Himachal Pradesh. Top Places to visit in Lahaul and Spiti, Kyelang Himachal Pradesh
content: The Lahaul and Spiti district in the Indian state of Himachal Pradesh consists of the two formerly separate districts of Lahaul and Spiti. Top Places to visit in Kinnaur, Reckong Peo, Himachal Pradesh
content: Kinnaur is one of twelve administrative districts in the Indian state of Himachal Pradesh, India. The district is divided into three administrative areas – Pooh, Kalpa, and Nichar(Bhabanagar)– and has six tehsils (counties). The administrative headquarters of Kinnaur district is at Re

title: Top Places to visit in Kangra, Dharamshala Himachal Pradesh
Top Places to visit in Hamirpur, Himachal Pradesh
content: Hamirpur is a town and the headquarters of Hamirpur district in the Himalayan state of Himachal Pradesh, India. Hamirpur is located in the Lower West Central Outer Himalayas at an average elevation of 790 M above sea level . Far northern High Altitude Dhauladhar Ranges overlook the city. Hamirpur

title: Top Places to visit in Chamba, Himachal Pradesh
content: Chamba is a town in the Chamba district in the Indian state of Himachal Pradesh. According to the 2001 Indian census, the town is situated on the banks of the Ravi River (a major tributary of the Trans-Himalayan Indus River), at its confluence with the Sal River. title: Top Places to visit in Bilaspur, Himachal Pradesh
content:
Bilaspur is a city and a municipal council in Bilaspur district in the state of Himachal Pradesh, India.
 
Transportation
